Elise Hoovler


~Freelance Frontend Developer~

About

Hi and welcome to my portfolio! I am a very driven, self-motivated and detail-oriented multi-tasking individual with strong communication skills and a passion for creativity. I've always had a strong desire to be in the tech industry, specifically web development so I have spent the last 2-3 years studying self-taught through various courses on front-end development. I am eager to continue learning and eventually expand into full stack development.
